description: This file contains unit tests for the ReferralsService, testing referral submission success and failure scenarios using mock Dio HTTP client.

classes.name: MockDio
classes.description: A mock implementation of the Dio HTTP client used for testing exchanges.

methods.description: Contains the test groups and test cases for the ReferralsService.

methods.name: setUpAll
methods.description: Initializes test environment before all tests run.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Prepares a new mock Dio instance before each test.
